description: USDA species code, or the first 2 letters of species scientific name
label for light treatment, "fs" represents for full sunlight treatment and "s" represents for 50% shade treatment
label for block: e.g. b4 is block 4
total fresh mass of sub-sample from the plant
fresh mass of dead material of the sub-sample
oven-dried mass of the leaf portion of the sub-sample
oven-dried mass of the non-leaf portion of the sub-sample
